segments.text: Ah, the children are clearly up to no good, and it's quite a spectacle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is scaling that unstable stool, his body stretched impossibly high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the "COOKIE JAR," pulling out the forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, practically vibrating with anticipation for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, as if she's waiting for the spoils of the raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look like a perfect little team of co-conspirators.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment, sneaking cookies when the adult isn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks terribly wobbly, though; I hope he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste those fresh cookies, still warm, perhaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their expressions of focused intent are really quite amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just love the sheer audacity of their little plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are completely oblivious to the overflowing sink, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonder how much mischief can happen in a quiet kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet they'll have crumbs all over the floor in a moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a delightful, sneaky pair, these two.
segments.speaker: PAR
